name: Briiik
description:
Briiik is a minimalist clicker game. The more you have columns, the worse it is ... for your sanity :) The goal is simple : click on the colored columns, try to not miss one. When you miss 4 columns, game is over.

Blue columns freeze time, purple columns erase one miss. Will you find the best strategy to score the most points ?

Controls : Click, click, click.

Briiik was made during Ludum Dare 40 in December 2017.  The theme was : "there you have, the worse it is". It was made from scratch in 8 hours. 

And my best is 150, could you beat me ? :)
